text: Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 2 to 3 north to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Mainly fine. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 4 northerly winds.
